trans-unit.source: Hermes server is offline, please turn the station on.
trans-unit.target: el servidor Hermes no está en linea, por favor, encender la estación.
El nombre de usuario no existe!

trans-unit.source: to access admin features, put your username and password
trans-unit.target: para acceder a las funciones de administración, introducir su nombre de usuario y contraseña

trans-unit.source: passwords must have at least 8 characters
trans-unit.target: passwords must have at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter and one number

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete

trans-unit.target: esta acción no se puede revertir!

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you wanna update
There was an error on precessing your request
trans-unit.target: There was an error on precessing your request

trans-unit.source: Hermes system provides a telecommunication system trough the use of short wave HF radio.
trans-unit.target: Hermes system provides a telecommunication system trough the use of short wave HF radio.

trans-unit.source: Hermes system allows transmission of text and files between connected stations, through public messages, sent through this interface or private messages, though Deltachat application or webmail interface.
trans-unit.target: Hermes system allows transmission of text and files between connected stations, through public messages, sent through this interface or private messages, though Deltachat application or webmail interface.

trans-unit.source: When accessing the Hermes wifi radio through a cellphone or computer, you will be directed to the Hermes web interface. With that you can send public messages between stations and read messages sent to you community. It's also possible to create users for email accounts and also to administrate the system.
trans-unit.target: When accessing the Hermes wifi radio through a cellphone or computer, you will be directed to the Hermes web interface. With that you can send public messages between stations and read messages sent to you community. It's also possible to create users for email accounts and also to administrate the system.

trans-unit.source: Public messages can be sent between stations, and are listed on the main page of the web interface.
trans-unit.target: Public messages can be sent between stations, and are listed on the main page of the web interface.

trans-unit.source: By clicking on the icon, it's possible to write a new message and to attach files such as images or sound files.
trans-unit.target: By clicking on the icon, it's possible to write a new message and to attach files such as images or sound files.

trans-unit.source: Public messages can be sent to your own station, which is a easy way to publicize news inside your own community.
trans-unit.target: Public messages can be sent to your own station, which is a easy way to publicize news inside your own community.

trans-unit.source: Public messages can also be password protected, which means that only the ones that know the password will be able to read their content, but their description still will be readable by everyone.
trans-unit.target: Public messages can also be password protected, which means that only the ones that know the password will be able to read their content, but their description still will be readable by everyone.

trans-unit.source: Have in mind that once a password for the message (has to be at least 4 characcters) is defined, there is no way to recover it, nor to change it.
trans-unit.target: Have in mind that once a password for the message (has to be at least 4 characcters) is defined, there is no way to recover it, nor to change it.

trans-unit.source: A system administrator can change who can attach files on messages between stations: everyone withe access to the network, only registered users, or only administrators.
trans-unit.target: A system administrator can change who can attach files on messages between stations: everyone withe access to the network, only registered users, or only administrators.

trans-unit.source: Once the messages are sent, they will go to a transmission queue before arriving at their final destination. A system administrator can cancel the packages before they are sent, and also delete the sent and received messages. This is a task that need to be done often to avoid that the space in the server ends.
trans-unit.target: Once the messages are sent, they will go to a transmission queue before arriving at their final destination. A system administrator can cancel the packages before they are sent, and also delete the sent and received messages. This is a task that need to be done often to avoid that the space in the server ends.

trans-unit.source: As the communication between the stations are unidirectional, the transmissions are schedules to happen every (()))hour, alternating between reception and transmission events. In an emergency case, the system administrator can force message transmission queue by clicking on the "transmit now" link. This can interrupt receiving messages from other stations for a while.
trans-unit.target: As the communication between the stations are unidirectional, the transmissions are schedules to happen every (()))hour, alternating between reception and transmission events. In an emergency case, the system administrator can force message transmission queue by clicking on the "transmit now" link. This can interrupt receiving messages from other stations for a while.

trans-unit.source: To access admin features, you need an admin password, while anyone can create an user account, and only the system's admins can create new administrator users.
trans-unit.target: To access admin features, you need an admin password, while anyone can create an user account, and only the system's admins can create new administrator users.

trans-unit.source: Inside the admin section, an admin user will find the following options:
trans-unit.target: Inside the admin section, an admin user will find the following options:

trans-unit.source: Users management: allows creation of new users, updating data of registered users and to delete users of the system. Every username correspond to a email account with the same name of the kind username@servername. On this station the server name will be
trans-unit.target: Users management: allows creation of new users, updating data of registered users and to delete users of the system. Every username correspond to a email account with the same name of the kind username@servername. On this station the server name will be

trans-unit.source: Administrators can also give admin powers to regular users, by clicking on the "is admin" checkbox on the update user interface
trans-unit.target: Administrators can also give admin powers to regular users, by clicking on the "is admin" checkbox on the update user interface

trans-unit.source: Network info: displays some information about the system, such as network adresses, calsign, servername etc
trans-unit.target: Network info: displays some information about the system, such as network adresses, calsign, servername etc

trans-unit.source: Stations: provides a list of the connected stations on the system
trans-unit.target: Stations: provides a list of the connected stations on the system

trans-unit.source: Detailed Log: provides access to system logs, such as email logs and uucp logs, that register every activity on the system
trans-unit.target: Detailed Log: provides access to system logs, such as email logs and uucp logs, that register every activity on the system

trans-unit.source: Radio configuration: provides an interface to access and change frequency and radio transmission mode. It also allows to restore factory configuration.
trans-unit.target: Radio configuration: provides an interface to access and change frequency and radio transmission mode. It also allows to restore factory configuration.

trans-unit.source: select who can attach files to messages:
trans-unit.target: seleccionar quién puede adjuntar archivos a los mensajes:

trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to shut down Hermes system? This will stop messages transmission and reception.
